projects.title: Deep Learning-Driven Automated Segmentation of High-Resolution 3D Histological Mouse Brain Volumes
projects.institution: The National Institute of Health and Medical Research (INSERM), France
projects.description: Developed a deep learning pipeline for automated segmentation of high-resolution 3D histological mouse brain images, enhancing the understanding of genetic impacts on brain structure.

projects.title: Deep Learning-Based Skin Lesion Classification: A Computer-Aided Diagnostic
projects.description: Utilizing the ISIC dataset, it addresses binary and multiclass classification challenges through data preprocessing, augmentation, and neural networks like InceptionNet and EfficientNet.

projects.title: Elastix-Based CT Image Registration for COPD Lung Analysis
projects.description: This research contributes to enhancing medical imaging practices in managing COPD, based on data from the COPDgene study.

projects.title: Deep Learning Approaches for 3D Segmentation of Human Brain Tissues
projects.description: Developed a brain tissue segmentation project at the University of Girona using advanced deep learning techniques for accurate 3D brain tissue classification.

projects.title: Automated Classification of Skin Lesion Using Deep Learning Techniques
projects.institution: University of Cassino and Southern Lazio, Italy
projects.description: The classification of skin lesions (benign, melanoma, and seborrheic keratosis) using deep learning approaches to assist in early diagnosis.

projects.title: Classification of Alzheimer's Disease Using MRI Images and Gene Expression Data
projects.institution: University of Cassino and Southern Lazio, Italy
projects.description: To categorize Alzheimer's disease (AD), mild cognitive impairment (MCI), and cognitively normal (CN) subjects using multimodal data analysis.

projects.title: Regression Challenge: Using Linear Regression and KNN Model
projects.institution: University of Cassino and Southern Lazio, Italy
projects.description: Developed a regression algorithm using linear regression and KNN model to predict continuous values with high accuracy.

projects.title: Bibliography Review: Automated Kidney Image Segmentation Using AI & Deep Learning approach
projects.description: Research articles prepared a review report on Automated Kidney Image Segmentation using traditional image processing and deep learning techniques.

projects.title: Traffic (signal light) Simulation and Violation Alert
projects.description: The "Traffic Signal Light Simulation and Violation Alert System" enhances road safety through intelligent traffic management and real-time violation detection.
